name: Booth Shot Lincoln
description:
Conspiracy Theory: Booth is plotting with the military to kill Lincoln-(In this world the military is helping lincoln instead of plotting with booth), and found himself betrayed by the military and now he must do what he planned on doing alone.

It is a stealth game. Try to not be discovered by the blue policeman, else it will start shooting at you. Booth has a civil war pistol, with reload time 5 seconds, and a dagger. The efficient option is to tackle enemy by using dagger.
